itemDisplayName: Create an new HA SharePoint Farm
description: This template creates nine new Azure VMs, with a public IP address, NAT'd RDP port for one VM, load balancers and VNet, it configures two VM to be AD DCs for a new Forest and Domain, a Windows Failover Cluster with three VMs, two SQL Server VMs in an availability group and a fileshare witness VM, two SharePoint Web Servers and two SharePoint App Servers
summary: This template creates a Highly Available SharePoint Farm with nine Azure VMs
